meanings.definition: The quality or state of being militant.
meanings.sent1: Her militantness in defending her beliefs was admirable.
meanings.sent2: The militantness of the group scared many people.
meanings.sent3: His militantness in arguing for extra recess time made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The militantness of the storm was evident in the howling winds.
meanings.sent5: The militantness of the lioness protecting her cubs was a sight to behold.

meanings.definition: The attitude or actions of a militant person or group.
meanings.sent1: The soldier's militantness in battle was unmatched.
meanings.sent2: The militantness of the protesters could be felt in the air.
meanings.sent3: Their militantness in demanding more pizza toppings was amusing to watch.
meanings.sent4: The militantness of the waves crashing against the shore was mesmerizing.
meanings.sent5: The militantness of the bees defending their hive was fierce and determined.
